nodes.text: The Kingdom of Dreams was a starship capable of interdimensional travel. Cody Sunn-Childe and his followers retreated to an extra-dimensional realm in the Kingdom. Although the starship also existed in realspace, Sunn-Childe claimed that everything in his City of Dreams was composed not of matter, but of "psychic energy."

The Kingdom of Dreams consisted of a flat superstructure resembling an island and the dome-covered City of Dreams constructed on top, surrounded by a fantastic jungle. The ship could travel between dimensions, allowing Sunn-Childe and his followers to escape the ravages of the Galactic Civil War. It was destroyed by Captain Plikk and Lieutenant Nizzon's fleet of Imperial Star Destroyers in 3 ABY by means of hyper-drive pod energy channeled through laser batteries; all its residents were killed, including Sunn-Childe.
